Francesco Esposito is a Front End Software Engineer with more than 3 years of professional experience in Web Development. JavaScript is his best friend. He is able to turn an ugly code base into a beautiful front-end applications. Francesco holds a Master's degree in Software Engineering from the University of Salerno (Italy). When not working or coding, he enjoys to experiment in Mediterranean cuisine and travelling.

March 2014 - June 2015
Zürich, Switzerland http://www.yourehab.com
  • JavaScript
  • d3js
  • jQuery
  • Angularjs
  • C#
  • PHP
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • XSLT

Training Planner : Software that helps the creation and the management of video game rehabilitation plans. The Training Planner helps the physiotherapist to create customized plans for each patient choosing the type of game with its settings (velocity, difficulty, etc. ) and plan relative settings, such as time interval between two games. That enables a patient to play the whole plan independently and without remove the gloves.
Development of a Windows service in .NET, that sends by e-mail a weekly report of each patient to physiotherapists.
Data Visualization Module: starting from raw data produced by the video games a data analysis and visualization module has been created concerning the patient's rehabilitation history.
